title: Mendoza's Secret Fortune
description: MAY THE BEST MENDOZA WIN!The Fortunes are not the only hotties in Texas; their longtime friends the Mendozas are legendary for their good looks and ardent hearts. Tall and dark with soulful eyes, Matteo Mendoza is a pilot whose charms have too often been eclipsed by his more outgoing brother, Cisco. Now, Matteo has set his sights on cantina hostess Rachel Robinson. Brother, look out!After several years on a self-imposed "romance diet," Rachel finds Matteo to be a treat she just can't resist. But she's already been through her own family heartbreak--the last thing she wants is to come between the Mendozas! Can she learn that following her heart might lead to the greatest fortune of all?
author: Marie Ferrarella
